lead_paragraph: A day after winning her third medal at the world championships in Stuttgart, Germany, Alicia Sacramone announced she would turn professional. Sacramone, 19, competed for Brown last season and was named the E.C.A.C. rookie of the year. Sacramone was one of only a few United States women in the past two decades to compete in college and elite gymnastics at the same time.
